membership.title: Basic Membership
membership.description: This is the basic plan a to become a member of C.A.I Soccer Club. You will be able to visit the stadium 1 time each month. And you will be allowed to buy tockets for every game.

membership.title: Gold Membership
membership.description: Purchasing the gold membership you will be able to participate in our monthly giveaway with many prizes. You will obatain the same benefits as a basic membership plus the addition of a free ticket each month to a game AT 'El Libertadores de America'and the option to buy gold tickets for any game.

membership.title: VIP Membership
membership.description: VIP members will obtain access to exclusively merchandising, the option to buy VIP tickets with the best benefits and discounts and a weekly chance to meet and greet with one soccer club star.
